strapiJob.title: Medical Assistant (MA)
strapiJob.description:
This is a key role as a primary point of contact for patients of Ivey Family Medicine. Ivey Family Medicine is a close knit fast-paced environment requiring a positive and adaptive nature. We are looking for an energetic person who loves patient care and is willing to learn new things.

Tasks/Accountabilities:

• Strong daily on-time attendance is critical.

• Greet patients both in person and on the phone to the clinic in a customer-oriented manner.

• Assist physician with the duties of that role.

• Room patients and take histories for entry into the EMR.

• Obtain prior authorizations.

• Give intramuscular and subcutaneous and intradermal injections.

• Obtain blood samples and do in-house lab tests.

• Ensure exam rooms are clean.

• Manage referral requirements accurately and in a timely manner.

• Effectively meet post exam process requirements.

• Take inventory of medical and exam room supplies.

• Additional compensation for phlebotomy skills and medical scribe experience.

Experience/Education:

• Certified from an accredited medical assistant program with current certification.

• Certified BLS

• Experience in using an EMR required.

• Minimum 1 year experience as a Medical Assistant in a medical clinic required.

• Working knowledge and medical terminology is required.

• Must be able to work well in a small team environment.

• Have an affinity and passion for excellence in healthcare.

• Knowledge of HIPAA.
